title: Negotiation with a cyclops
content:
* Head to Cyclops Path speak to the Cyclops Guard, who will request some Gnomic silver before you're allowed to pass
 * Head to the Gnome Forge and speak to Gretel Torrelli about acquiring Gnomic silver.
 * Head east into the Gnomic Silver Mine to mine Gnomic silver.
 * Return to Cyclops Path and speak to the Cyclops Guard who will allow entry.


 * Access to Crenopolis
 * 16900 Minefighter XP
 * 24500 Miner XP
 * 88s 300 from Goblin Loot Chest
